default.user:read: View user information in Kick including username, streamer ID, etc.
default.channel:read: View channel information in Kick including channel description, category, etc.
default.channel:write: Update livestream metadata for a channel based on the channel ID
default.chat:write: Send chat messages and allow chat bots to post in your chat
default.streamkey:read: Read a user's stream URL and stream key
default.events:subscribe: Subscribe to all channel events on Kick e.g. chat messages, follows, subscriptions
default.kicks:read: View KICKs related information in Kick e.g leaderboards, etc.
